job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an Azure Cloud Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.

     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.

     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.

     * Task Managing their cloud resources and ensuring optimal performance and security. You will also be responsible for migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure, troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure, continuously improving our customers' cloud operations, and staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work/life needs.
job_details.full_text:
Azure Cloud Engineer

As an Azure Cloud Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.

     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.

     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.

     * Task Managing their cloud resources and ensuring optimal performance and security. You will also be responsible for migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure, troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure, continuously improving our customers' cloud operations, and staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work/life needs.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Azure cloud infrastructure management and traditional DevOps practices, with no mention of machine learning, generative AI, or related modeling tasks. It lacks the core elements required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases: advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies
align technical solutions with strategic goals
translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: Phrases indicate understanding customer goals and translating them into cloud strategies and technical requirements.

phrases: designing, building, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions
designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on building and deploying cloud infrastructure and solutions, which aligns with the software development aspect of infrastructure as code and service deployment.

phrases: ensuring security and optimizing their infrastructure
refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes
facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines
automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools
utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows
ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments
Managing their cloud resources and ensuring optimal performance and security
migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure
troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure
continuously improving our customers' cloud operations
job_tasks.justification: Extensive mention of DevOps, CI/CD, IaC, cloud operations, optimization, and management directly maps to Operations Engineering principles, specifically in a cloud context (CloudOps/MLOps).

skills: fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment
troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure
staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices
lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework
